data.event: In the mid 1990s, Hampton annexed a short stretch of U.S. Highway 301 west of the city in order to get revenue from traffic tickets issued to motorists driving on that highway.

event.title: November 2013, the city's mayor was arrested

data.event: In November 2013, the city's mayor was arrested for selling Oxycodone.

event.title: February 10, 2014 auditors from the Florida Joint Legislative Auditing Committee presented

data.event: On February 10, 2014 auditors from the Florida Joint Legislative Auditing Committee presented 31 violations of state law, city charter and federal tax requirements to state legislators.
State legislators visited Hampton on March 28, 2014 to see if the issues had been solved.
